nodes.bodyText: could you change the name of the tests to the new schema, please?
Done
what happens to the details?
I'm not sure what you mean. HistoryEventImpl extends TaskanaHistoryEvent which has a constructor that sets the details (as well as the userId).
should we rather use 'null'? I just don't want that the database created an empty CLOB for an empty String. Do you know how it is handled?
Was considering null too, changed this now
I don't think that this should be part of the SPI. This would create a dependency from core to the history we don't want to have.

Do we have another unit test for this? The explicit/autocommit ... tests should be for db related spefic tests only.
And maybe we do need some more tests here?
We do not need the guarded logging here, as this is the first call in the logger.
Do you mind using our generic triplet class?
